title: Did Kellyanne Conway’s Inaugural Dress Copy a 1970s Simplicity Pattern?
subtitle: An image suggesting Trump counselor Kellyanne Conway's inaugural ensemble resembled a 1970's 'Simplicity' pattern was doctored.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Gucci ensemble worn by Trump counselor Kellyanne Conway to the inauguration closely resembled a 1970s 'Simplicity' pattern.
